title: Is a self-learning programming efficient? - Quora

response.answer_text: Only if you achieve results successfully,If you stuck at some point and can’t progress further try to find mentor or partner to discuss.Learning programming language is not that hard but solving problem is. Try to read books related to programming . Programming is continuous learning process,If you stop you will be outdated. True Programming is achieved only through self learning but sometimes it need help from others. Read.Practice.Learn
